Package lib.homies.framework.utils

Interface MessageUtils

All Known Implementing Classes:
SpigotMessageUtils
public interface MessageUtils
A platform-agnostic interface for utility methods related to sending messages to players. This service abstracts away platform-specific message sending mechanisms.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    actionBar(HomiesPlayer player, String message)
    Sends an action bar message to a specific player.
    void
    broadcast(String message)
    Broadcasts a message to all online players on the current platform.
    String
    replacePlaceholders(HomiesPlayer player, String message)
    Replaces common placeholders in a message string for a given player.
    void

    Sends a message to a specific player.

    title(HomiesPlayer player, String title, String subtitle, int fadeIn, int stay, int fadeOut)
    Sends a title and subtitle to a specific player.

  • Method Details

    • send

      void send(HomiesPlayer player, String message)
      Sends a message to a specific player. Color codes are typically supported and handled by the underlying platform implementation.
      Parameters:
      player - The HomiesPlayer to send the message to.
      message - The message string to send.

    • broadcast

      void broadcast(String message)
      Broadcasts a message to all online players on the current platform. Color codes are typically supported and handled by the underlying platform implementation.
      Parameters:
      message - The message string to broadcast.

    • actionBar

      void actionBar(HomiesPlayer player, String message)
      Sends an action bar message to a specific player. If the platform does not support action bars, it may fall back to a regular chat message or be a no-op.
      Parameters:
      player - The HomiesPlayer to send the action bar to.
      message - The action bar message string.

    • title

      void title(HomiesPlayer player, String title, String subtitle, int fadeIn, int stay, int fadeOut)
      Sends a title and subtitle to a specific player. If the platform does not support titles, it may fall back to regular chat messages or be a no-op.
      Parameters:
      player - The HomiesPlayer to send the title to.
      title - The main title string.
      subtitle - The subtitle string.
      fadeIn - The fade-in time in ticks.
      stay - The stay time in ticks.
      fadeOut - The fade-out time in ticks.

    • replacePlaceholders

      String replacePlaceholders(HomiesPlayer player, String message)
      Replaces common placeholders in a message string for a given player. Implementations should handle platform-specific placeholders (e.g., %player_name%).
      Parameters:
      player - The HomiesPlayer for whom to replace placeholders.
      message - The message string containing placeholders.
      Returns:
      The message string with placeholders replaced.
